_comment: PRODUCTION CONFIG — P91b Champion + Vol Tilt + Vol Regime Overlay (Phase 129)
_validated: Phases 91-129: walk-forward stable, OOS validated, cost-robust, regime-insured, vol tilt (P113) + price vol overlay (P129) validated; global_ls_overlay (P118b) WF PASS 2026-02-21; breadth regime switching (P144-146): LOYO 4/5 +0.3179 OBJ, WF 1/2, capture 87.5%; funding dispersion boost (P148): LOYO 3/5, WF 2/2, OBJ=1.8886

data_policy._comment: Hard gate: production only accepts real, whitelisted providers

volume_tilt._comment: Phase 111-113: reduce leverage when aggregate volume momentum is high (crowded market)
volume_tilt._validated: 3/4 WF windows positive, avg Δ=+0.066, ratio perfectly stable (std=0.00)
volume_tilt.mechanism: Sum perp_volume across all symbols → log momentum (168h) → rolling z-score → contrarian tilt

vol_regime_overlay._comment: Phase 127-129: reduce leverage + tilt F144 when BTC price vol is high
vol_regime_overlay._validated: LOYO 3/5 wins avg Δ=+0.232, expanding 2/4 wins, fixed threshold OBJ=1.72 vs baseline 1.57
vol_regime_overlay.condition: ann_vol > threshold → tilt F144 +20% and scale leverage ×0.50
vol_regime_overlay.mechanism: BTC hourly returns → rolling 168h std × √8760 → if > 0.50 → reduce + tilt

ensemble._comment: 4-signal blend — DO NOT remove v1 (regime insurance, Phase 102)

monitoring._comment: Thresholds for live monitoring — halt trading if breached

small_account_under_10k.note: Minimum viable: $10K. Below this, fees eat too much alpha.

medium_account_10k_100k.note: Sweet spot. Full strategy as designed.

large_account_100k_plus.note: May need to reduce leverage or add execution optimization.

global_ls_overlay._comment: Phase 118b: Binance Vision global long/short ratio z-score overlay
global_ls_overlay._validated: IS avg Δ=+0.380 (2022/2023/2024), OOS 2025 Δ=+0.1764 — WF PASS (3 IS + OOS primary gate)
global_ls_overlay._candidate_notes: taker_ls_z168_low also passes (OOS25=+0.07, OOS26=+0.17) — consider Phase 119 test
global_ls_overlay.mechanism: Binance Vision global L/S account ratio → log momentum → rolling 168h z-score → when z < 0 (crowd net short) → reduce portfolio returns by tilt_ratio=0.65 (contrarian protection)
global_ls_overlay.data_source: data.binance.vision daily metrics CSV resampled to 1h; local cache in .cache/binance_vision_metrics/

breadth_regime_switching._comment: Phase 144-146: Breadth regime classifier for dynamic weight switching
breadth_regime_switching._validated: P144 IS +0.1820 OBJ | P145 LOYO 4/5, +0.3179 OBJ, 87.5% capture | P146 WF 1/2 wins, avg_delta=+0.4020
breadth_regime_switching.mechanism: At each bar: compute % symbols with positive 168h return (breadth). Rolling percentile rank vs prior 336h. If <33rd pct → LOW weights. If 33-67% → MID weights. If >67% → HIGH weights. Apply on top of existing vol_regime_overlay (both active simultaneously).

funding_dispersion_overlay._comment: Phase 148: Funding rate cross-sectional dispersion boost
funding_dispersion_overlay._validated: LOYO 3/5 wins avg_delta=+0.0087 | WF 2/2 wins avg_delta=+0.0284 | IS OBJ=1.8886 (+0.0086)
funding_dispersion_overlay.mechanism: At each bar: compute std of funding rates across all 10 symbols. Rolling 336h percentile rank. If std_pct > 0.75 (high cross-sectional dispersion = differentiated market) → boost portfolio returns ×1.15. Logic: high dispersion = cross-sectional signals (idio, V1) can differentiate more effectively.
